* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

header {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  position: fixed;
  flex-direction: column;
  top: 0;
}

#header-img {
  width: 5vw;
  display: inline;
  padding: 10px 5px;
}

.background {
  color: black;
}

.body-wrapper {
  background: #ff6f00;
}

.video-wrapper {
  background: #ff0500;
  padding-top: 50px;
}

.product-wrapper {
  background: #ff0065;
  padding-bottom: 50px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

.design-wrapper {
  background: #ff00d0;
}

#home {
  width: 100vw;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

.image-wrapper1 {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

body {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}

section {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.background-color {
  display: flex;
  background: #ff6f00;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 30vh;
  z-index: -2;
  position: absolute;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

h1 {
  align-content: center;
  background: #c400ff;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  max-width: 1000px;
  padding-top: 35px;
  margin: 0;
  min-width: 1000px;
}

h2 {
  font-family: sans-serif;
}

p {
  text-indent: 25px;
  text-align: center;
  font-family: arial;
}

.title-wrapper {
  background: #803800;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  height: 150px;
}

header > p {
  font-family: sans-serif;
  background: gray;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
}

.image-wrapper {
  padding-top: 50px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  background: #ffd900;
  padding-bottom: 50px;
}

.intro {
  padding: 50px 0;
  font-family: sans-serif;
  font-size: 20px;
}

@media (min-width: 840px) {
  h1 {
    font-size: 40px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 500px) {
  h1 {
    font-size: 15px;
  }
}

.header-background {
  width: 50vw;
  height: 30vh;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.navigation {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  background: #d45c00;
}

.video {
  width: 50vw;
  height: 30vw;
  background: black;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border: 5px dotted gray;
  border-top-right-radius: 40%;
  border-top-left-radius: 30%;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 10%;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
}

.nav {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-evenly;
  align-items: center;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: sans-serif;
  background: #50ff00;
  max-width: 750px;
  width: 100%;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: white;
  border: 2px solid black;
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #00ffef;
  background: #008007;
}

.nav > p {
  color: white;
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
  .nav{
    flex-direction: column;
    display: inline-block;
    width: 350px;
  }

  .nav > p {
    padding: 5px 0;
  }

 
}

@media (min-width: 750px) {
  .nav {
    font-size: 20px;
    width: 100vw;
    max-width: 100vw;
}
}

@media (min-width: 1000px) {
  .nav {
    font-size: 30px;
    width: 100vw;
    max-width: 100vw;
  }
}

.buy-products {
  display: inline-grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3 1fr);
  grid-template-rows: repeat(3 1fr);
  outline: 5px solid black;
  margin: 100px auto;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  justify-content: center;
  min-width: 1100px;
  background: black;
}

.product-name {
  grid-row: 1;
  font-family: impact;
  font-size: 30px;
  background: orange;
  padding: 10px;
  border: 2.5px solid gray;
  border-top: none;
  text-indent: 0;
}



.product-image {
  grid-row: 2;
  padding: 10px;
  background-color: green;
  border: 2.5px solid gray;
  object-fit: cover;
  width: 250px;
  height: 250px;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.price {
  grid-row: 3;
  padding: 20px;
  background-color: red;
  border: 2.5px solid gray;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: sans-serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 40px;
}

.no-left-border {
  border-left: none;
}

.no-right-border {
  border-right: none;
}

.design-form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  margin: 50px 0;
  outline: 10px solid yellow;
  background: blue;
  padding: 50px;
  justify-content: space-evenly;
  align-items: center;
}

.design p {
  color: black;
  font-family: impact;
  font-size: 40px;
  border: 5px solid black;
  background: orange;
  text-indent: 0;
  padding: 0 20px;
  min-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.design-input {
  display: block;
  width: 80%;
  height: 10%;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  background: pink; 
  font-size: 40px; 
  border: 4px solid red;
  padding: 0;
}

.design-submit {
  display: block;
  margin: 20px 0;
  background: red;
  width: 300px;
  height: 75px;
  border-right: 6px solid black;
  border-bottom: 4px solid black;
  border-top: 3px solid gray;
  border-left: 3px solid gray;
}

.design-submit:hover {
  animation: rainbow 1s ease-in-out infinite;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.design-submit:active {
  cursor: wait;
  background: none;
}

@keyframes rainbow {
  0% {
    background: red;
  }

  16%{
    background: orange;
  }
  
  32%{
    background: yellow;
  }

  50% {
    background: green;
  }

  68% {
    background: blue;
  }

  84% {
    background: violet;
  }

  100% {
    background: red;
  }


}

.design-submit a {
  background: red;
}

.design a {
  background: none;
}

.image-1 {
  width: 30%;
}
